name: Rattle Lad
description:
My entry for Metroidvania 19 game jam.

Controls:

  • wasd to move
  • spacebar to jump
  • left mouse to attack
  • the rest is explained in game

NOTE: particles and shaders don't work properly in web version. the downloads are higher quality!

Take on the role of Skelly, the lonely Skeleton who just wants to get out of this mess, as he embarks on the adventure of a lifetime.

Big thanks to the creators of the assets I used for this project:

https://anokolisa.itch.io/basic-140-tiles-grassland-and-mines

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

15.03.23 - 1.4 Update: Fixed a game-breaking bug where dying normally after dying in a bossfight would crash the game.

16.03.23 - 1.5 Update: Fix another crash... I don't know how my wife keeps finding these things.
